channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Skechers Footwear
channel.desc: Step out in style in Skechers! Renowned for their on-trend, sporty designs, you can now find their fab shoes at QVC too.

channel.desc: Join us to discover the Apricot fashion styles that your wardrobe needs to help you transition smoothly into the coming season.

channel.desc: Tune in for an hour of new style with presenter Katy and let her, our trusted stylists and fashion experts, show you the latest trends. Right now it's all about embracing the new season.

channel.desc: From chic daywear to evening sophistication and weekend comfort to party glamour, discover the Kim & Co collection - designed for every occasion.

channel.title: Diamonique Jewellery

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Everyday Footwear
channel.desc: Relax in style and comfort with our great range of everyday shoes, including comfy flats, supportive trainers and chic sandals. Tune in now for an hour of casual footwear perfect for your new routine.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Marla Wynne Fashion Collection
channel.desc: Update your wardrobe for the new year with gorgeous Wynne Layers fashion from MarlaWynne, featuring layering pieces, scarves and more to help give every outfit the perfect finishing touch.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Style your Autumn Home
channel.desc: Style your home with the latest autumn home trends. From accent accessories to bedding and fragrance, discover the perfect pieces to add a cosy touch to your space.

channel.title: The Lunchtime Show
channel.desc: Join us and our great panel of guests at lunchtime as they enjoy a chat and share a selection of fantastic products from top brands on QVC.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Alpha-H Skincare
channel.desc: Give your skin a boost with hi-tech skincare featuring a synergy of blended botanical ingredients coupled with glycolic acid - an alpha hydroxy acid which occurs naturally in sugar cane.

channel.title: New Season Fashion
channel.desc: Feel inspired with our New Season Fashion show featuring White Stuff! Discover their unique prints and versatile pieces, perfect for transitioning into the new season.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Grande Cosmetics
channel.desc: Feel naturally beautiful with Grande Cosmetics. Their transformative serums are designed to enhance your natural lashes, brows, hair, and lips, so you can feel empowered to be yourself every day.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: White Stuff
channel.desc: Discover White Stuff in this show, featuring inspired fashion that combines eclectic prints, flattering shapes and fresh designs. Update your wardrobe with pieces you'll wear again and again.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Autumn Fashion Day Review
channel.desc: Did you miss out on all the Autumn Day Fashion action? Fear not, our Review show brings you our top highlights of the day.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Ruth Langsford on 4 Easy Pay
channel.desc: Explore stylish fashion with Ruth Langsford and spread the cost in 4, interest-free. Discover classic basics, vibrant prints and effortlessly chic styles. Tune in and transform your look today.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Prime Fifty Supplements
channel.desc: The Prime Fifty range features nutritional supplements tailored specifically to the needs of the over 50s and beyond, helping you to have the time of your life in the prime of your life.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Handbag Must Haves
channel.desc: Find your new favourite bag in this showcase of must-have handbags, from gorgeous totes to clever cross-bodies. Discover yours today.
